sourcing.instructions:
Cr (Chromium) can be sourced from a chemical supplier or online chemical marketplace. 
 K (Potassium) can be obtained from a chemical supply store. 
 Nd (Neodymium) can be sourced from rare earth element suppliers. 
 O (Oxygen) can be sourced as part of air or from a laboratory gas supplier.

preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 40.0 g of Chromium powder. 
 2. Measure out 19.1 g of Potassium powder. 
 3. Measure out 16.6 g of Neodymium oxide powder. 
 4. Measure out 24.3 g of Oxygen in a gaseous form or ensure it is available in the environment. 
 5. Combine all solids in a clean, dry mixing bowl. 
 6. Mix thoroughly using a mortar and pestle or a mechanical mixer for at least 10 minutes until homogenous.
